name: genkit-cli
description: CLI for interacting with the Google GenKit AI framework

scripts.build: (npm run init:deps) && (npm run build:common) && (npm run build:cli) && (npm run build:ui) && (npm run copy-ui-build) && (npm run build:plugins)
scripts.build:plugins: (cd plugins/google && npm run build) && (cd plugins/firebase && npm run build)
scripts.copy-ui-build: rm -rf dist/client && cd ui && rsync -r dist ../dist/client --exclude dist/ui/browser/assets/monaco-editor
scripts.pack:plugins: for i in plugins/*/; do cd $i && npm pack --pack-destination ../../../dist -ws; done

author: Firebase (https://firebase.google.com)
